# It appears that I am too far from the target position to place the stone furnaces. The maximum placement distance is 10 units, and I am currently at position (0, 0).
# I need to move closer to the coordinates where I want to place the furnaces.

# I will move to a position that is closer to the iron patch where I gathered resources, specifically to the coordinates of the iron patch (x=-14.5, y=26.5).
move_to(Position(x=-14.5, y=26.5))
print("Moving closer to the iron patch to place the stone furnaces...")
